title: Free Checking
content:
Free Checking


Use Case

When I need a simple checking account, I want one with no fees or minimum balances, so I can avoid hassles.v


External Problem

Many checking accounts have monthly fees, minimum balance requirements, and restrictions.


External Solution

The free checking account has no monthly fees and no minimum balance.


Internal Problem

I feel frustrated when my time, money, and attention are wasted by fees and balance requirements.


Internal Solution

With free checking, I just don’t have to worry about any of that hassle anymore. 


Philosophical Problem

I shouldn’t have to waste my time and money with silly requirements and fees.


Philosophical Solution

I get all the basics I expect without jumping through hoops.



Problem & Solution

Many checking accounts have monthly fees, minimum balance requirements, and restrictions. I feel frustrated when my time, money, and attention are wasted by fees and balance requirements. I shouldn’t have to waste my time and money with silly requirements and fees.


The free checking account has no monthly fees and no minimum balance. With free checking, I just don’t have to worry about any of that hassle anymore. I get all the basics I expect without jumping through hoops.


Features

  • No monthly fees
  • No minimum balance requirements
  • No per-check fees
  • Earn debit card rewards on every signature-based purchase
  • Free ATM access at 30,000 CO-OP® ATMs nationwide
  • Non-network ATM reimbursements up to 4 times per month*
  • Free overdraft protection options
  • Free online and mobile banking
  • RCUpay peer-to-peer payments {link to details page]**
  • {Get a rate bonus on RCU savings accounts when you have an active checking account} ***
